data.title: For his work on which of the following did Albert Einstein receive a Nobel prize?Black body radiationEther detectionPhotoelectric effectSpecial relativityGeneral relativity
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:for his work on which of the following did albert einstein receive a nobel prize
data.text:
Question

For his work on which of the following did Albert Einstein receive a Nobel prize?

Black body radiation

Ether detection

Photoelectric effect

Special relativity

General relativity

A

Special relativity

B

General relativity

C

Photoelectric effect

D

Black body radiation

E

Ether detection
